name: Super Safari Mel
description:
Play as Super Safari Mel play with a friend or alone run from the university to the Bar SK survive all obstacles. It's a DARK SOULS like METROIDvania like with 2d and 3d puzzles that challenges you you must be a master of the game and 2d retro classics. Room of 1000 snakes was my inspiration.

Features:

  • A head
  • Snakes
  • Beer 
  • Secret achievement points

Made for Beer SK game jam in Melbourne.

Controls:

  • A/S = Walk left / jump
  • K / L = Walk right / jump

Game resets after ~45seconds.

Alt+F4 to LEAVE
